long_description: When powdery side-country adventure awaits, load up the Osprey Reverb 18 snow pack with your snow-riding essentials and enjoy low-profile style and practical utility on the chairlift or out of bounds. Reinforced lower front-panel wing and a stowable strap on the left shoulder allow vertical board carry; reinforced hipbelt wing accommodates horizontal carry for short hikes. For quick and comfortable diagonal ski carry, slide the tails through the bottom front-panel webbing and secure the top of the ski with the left shoulder strap's webbing cinch. Back-panel entry to the main compartment allows access to gear when carrying skis or a snowboard and helps keep the back panel, shoulder straps and hipbelt out of the snow. Zippered protective sleeve with external drain and insulated tube route accommodate a reservoir (sold separately). Front-panel pocket offers speedy access to avalanche gear; larger probes and shovel handles stow in secure, external storage sleeves. the Osprey Reverb 18 snow pack also features a zippered goggles pocket.
